Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN PbAction::Execute (   )  [virtual]
 

Per default the message ActionExexutedMsg is send to the Dispatcher provided by the constructor or Init. This allows to implement the code for executing e. g. in a Window or an Application. It is also possible to implement the code simply by overwriting this method.

See also:
Window::OnActionExecuted

Reimplemented from Action.
